src.java.org.grails.jaxrs.provider
Class XMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.jaxrs.support.MessageBodyWriterSupport
      src.java.org.grails.jaxrs.provider.XMLWriter

@Provider
@Produces({"text/xml", "application/xml"})
class XMLWriter
extends MessageBodyWriterSupport

Provider for Grails' XML converter class. Message body writer that supports XML response entities. For example, to create an XML representation from a list of Grails domain objects: 

 @Path('/notes')
 @Produces('text/xml') // or 'application/xml'
 class NotesResource {
 
      @GET
      XML findNotes() {
          Note.findAll() as XML
      }
      
 }
Alternatively, one could write 
 @Path('/notes')
 @Produces('text/xml') // or 'application/xml'
 class NotesResource {
 
      @GET
      Response findNotes() {
          Response.ok(Note.findAll() as XML).build()
      }
      
 }
author:
Martin Krasser
